title: RBI approves a Committee of Executives (CoE) in Tamilnad Mercantile Bank as an interim arrangement
description: RBI approves Committee of Executives in Tamilnad Mercantile Bank as an interim arrangement. CoE comprises S Narayanan, D Ramesh, PR Ashok Kumar. Bank selecting suitable candidates for top post, unclear why Krishnan's successor not selected after 8 months. TMB had only one whole time director.
